mapper.insert: insert into tiktok_account (account_id, country, email, `password`, faction_id, `status`, excel_start, excel_end, create_time, update_time) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{excelStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{excelEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tiktok_account set country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, faction_id = #{factionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, excel_start = #{excelStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, excel_end = #{excelEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select account_id, country, email, `password`, faction_id, `status`, excel_start, excel_end, create_time, update_time from tiktok_account where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select account_id, country, email, `password`, faction_id, `status`, excel_start, excel_end, create_time, update_time from tiktok_account
